text: int nd ( int a [ ] , int , int ) ; int a [ 100000 ] ; int main ( ) { int t , i , n , c ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; int j = 0 ; long long count = 0 ; while ( j < n ) { for ( i = j ; i < n ; i ++ ) { c = nd ( a , j , i ) ; if ( c == 1 ) count ++ ; } j ++ ; } printf ( "\n%lld" , count + n ) ; } return 0 ; } int nd ( int a [ ] , int x , int y ) { int i , found ; for ( i = x ; i <= y ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] <= a [ i + 1 ] ) found = 1 ; else { found = 0 ; break ; } } if ( found == 1 ) return 1 ; else return 0 ; }
